name: Mission: Mars
description:
Hello there! This game was created by me in 3-4 days, for blackthornprod game jam, and i'm really proud of myself. It's also the first game of mine that anyone will ever play, so i'm exited. Please leave your feedback in the comments! I'm sorry because files is zip, but this was the only method that i could use.

UPDATE: Fixed two minor bugs with inventory and crafting and added some features requested on playtesting session. If you downloaded previous version, downloading this one won't delete your highscore.
